overview: Horatio Sanz is Winslow, a man who has wanted something all his life. As a boy he was inspired by his mother’s intellect and love of art. Now thirty years later, our hero yearns to do something never done. His friend and therapist, Matt Walsh tries to help. His girlfriend doesn’t understand. He meets a mysterious woman, Amy Hill, can she help him fulfill his dream?  To be the first male Geisha.
title: Geisho
